channel.title: Game closes
channel.description: when i click to walk 1 time its fine but when i click the 2nd time it closes the game out all the way. it doesnt matter waht server i download it does it for all of them but webclients. i have run reg fixes and scaned with all my anti virus malyware spyware many of times but still same thing can someone tell me what to do to fix this plz it is really anoying.
